resourceRoot: Hi, I'm served from the resource root 'DEPLOYMENT'. This is the folder 'Deployment'.
cacheBusterMode: I use cache busting on resource level. So you as an application user do not have to clear the browser cache after a server side software update.
contentNegotiation: I use content negotiation on the server to present language dependent texts and I make use of cache busting on repository level here.
icmCache: I use the ICM cache of SAP NetWeaver ABAP. Confirm the kernel and web dispatcher patches to support the Vary http response header have been installed.
